statements.query: MATCH (dataset:GCPBigqueryDataset{exposed_internet:true})<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:GCPOrganization{id:$GCP_ORGANIZATION_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WITH dataset LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE REMOVE dataset.exposed_internet, dataset.exposed_internet_type return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (access:GCPAcl)-[a:APPLIES_TO]->(dataset:GCPBigqueryDataset)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:GCPOrganization{id:$GCP_ORGANIZATION_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})
WHERE 'allUsers' IN access.special_group 
SET dataset.exposed_internet = true, (CASE WHEN NOT 'allUsers' IN  coalesce(dataset.exposed_internet_type , []) THEN dataset END).exposed_internet_type = coalesce(dataset.exposed_internet_type, []) + 'allUsers'

MATCH (access:GCPAcl)-[a:APPLIES_TO]->(dataset:GCPBigqueryDataset)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:GCPOrganization{id:$GCP_ORGANIZATION_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})
WHERE 'allAuthenticatedUsers' IN access.special_group 
SET dataset.exposed_internet = true, (CASE WHEN NOT 'allAuthenticatedUsers' IN  coalesce(dataset.exposed_internet_type , []) THEN dataset END).exposed_internet_type = coalesce(dataset.exposed_internet_type, []) + 'allAuthenticatedUsers'

MATCH (table:GCPBigqueryTable)<-[r:HAS_TABLE]-(dataset:GCPBigqueryDataset)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:GCPProject{id: $GCP_PROJECT_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:GCPOrganization{id:$GCP_ORGANIZATION_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID})
WHERE dataset.exposed_internet = true 
SET table.exposed_internet = true, table.exposed_internet_type = dataset.exposed_internet_type

name: GCP BigQuery public policy exposure analysis
